evaluationTests.query: When someone books a demo in Chili Piper, create a contact in Apollo
When we get a new review on G2, post it to Slack
Add new Gong calls to my Guru knowledge base
When someone signs our DocuSign NDA, grant access in Okta
Create a new project in Wrike when Typeform is submitted
When customer churns in Chargebee, remove access in Auth0 and revoke Workato license
Send new Snowflake query results to PowerBI
When new issue is created in Azure DevOps, create ticket in ServiceNow
Add rowing sessions from Hydrow to my Apple Health
When someone mentions us on Blind, send to Discord
Create tasks in Monday.com from Shortcut stories
When a new invoice is created in NetSuite, sync to Sage Intacct
Create Lattice goals from Asana projects
When new candidate appears in Lever, create user in JumpCloud
Add new LeanIX components to our Architecture Handbook in Confluence
When a deal closes in Close.com, create project in TeamGantt
Create Coda doc from new Pitch presentation
When contract is approved in Ironclad, create workspace in Retool
Add new Gong snippets to Chorus.ai library
When employee is terminated in Namely, revoke access in Rippling
Sync product specs from Productboard to Aha!
Create Metabase dashboard when new Amplitude cohort is created
When new report runs in Looker, send to Tableau
Add new Greenhouse candidates to iCIMS
When feature is deployed in LaunchDarkly, update status in StatusPage
Create Lucidchart diagram from Miro board
When new user signs up in Mixpanel, create profile in Pendo
Add new 6sense accounts to RollWorks
When new survey response in Qualtrics, add to Gainsight
Create tasks in Wrike from Clubhouse stories
When customer submits proof in Filestage, add to Bynder
Create Qatalog process from new Notion template
When user requests access in Mesh Directory, create ticket in Jira Service Management
Add new candidates from SmartRecruiters to Workday
When new post is created in Discourse, share on Yammer
Create monday.com pulse from Range check-in
When new task is created in Process Street, add to Teamwork
Add new Demodesk recordings to Gong
When new article is published on Dev.to, cross-post to Hashnode
Create UserPilot experience from new Pendo guide
When new document is uploaded to Box, scan with Nightfall
